means: （欧洲产的）莺类，白颊鸟类，美国产的黑色覆盆子

PerfectNetExp.abs: 鸟类分成两组:一组被称作“喜凉”鸟类,如苍头燕雀类(Chaffinch)和芦鳾类(Reed Bunting);另一组被称作“喜暖”鸟类,如金翅雀类(Goldfinch)和莺类(Blackcap)。.
Blackburn, Thomas 布拉克本blackcap 黑顶林莺Blackett, Patrick M(aynard) S(tuart), BARON BLACKE.
blackbutt || 黑基木 | blackcoat || 牧师, 职员 | blackcock || 黑色的雄松鸡4. 牧师/服勤人员 blackcap /莺类/白颊鸟类/黑色莓/ | blackcoat /牧师/.

means.word_mean: 1. raspberry native to eastern North America having black thimble-shaped fruit
4. small brownish-gray warbler with a black crown

auth_sentence.content: The Eurasian Blackcap's closest living relative is the Garden Warbler which looks quite different but has a similar song.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Eurasian Blackcap's closest living relative is the Garden Warbler which looks quite different but has a similar song.

auth_sentence.content: Blackcap, chiffchaff and grasshopper warbler joined in: songs of deep, springtime perfection, redolent of lushness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blackcap, chiffchaff and grasshopper warbler joined in: songs of deep, springtime perfection, redolent of lushness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blackcap, chiffchaff and grasshopper warbler joined in: songs of deep, springtime perfection, redolent of lushness.

auth_sentence.content: You don't need to be able to tell a blackcap from a garden warbler on song to have a stake in the wild countryside.
